title: About Me
text: I am a passionate web and mobile developer with experience in creating innovative applications and high-performance websites. My goal is to deliver creative and effective solutions that meet my clients' needs and enhance their online presence.

title: Projects
text: Here you can see some of my completed projects. If you are interested in contacting me to develop your own project, feel free to do so.

title: My Services
text: Here you can see the services I offer. If you need a web or mobile developer, feel free to contact me.

services.title: Web Development
services.short_text: Creation of modern and attractive web applications, optimized to enhance user experience.
services.detailed_text: Creation of modern and attractive web applications, optimized to enhance user experience. Includes both application design and development, as well as server implementation and database setup.

services.title: Mobile Development
services.short_text: Creation of native and cross-platform mobile applications, optimized to enhance user experience.
services.detailed_text: Creation of native and cross-platform mobile applications, optimized to enhance user experience. Includes both application design and development, as well as implementation on the operating system and database setup.

title: Contact
text: I'm here to help. If you have a project in mind, a creative idea you want to discuss, or just want to chat, feel free to get in touch with me!
